segments.text: Oh , no . Charlie , where is my purse ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t you have it ? Did you lose it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I did . I lost it . It disappeared .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Myrdal , purse doesn ’ t just disappear . Think carefully . When did you have it last ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I had it when I left the house . I had it when we start to get the hotdog .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Let ’ go back to the hotdog stand .
segments.speaker: S2
